name: The Last Drink: A league of legends story
name_original: The Last Drink: A league of legends story
description:
A short Visual Novel about the choices we make and the consequences of our actions, spoopy tale about a drunk man on the verge of changing a life for ever.

A kinetic example of one of my short stories turned to videogame, While it was made to practice on an engine, it is the full English release available to the public, please comment to let me know your thoughts and how I can improve.
